tags.name: Definitions
tags.description: Operations that provide definitions for various things

tags.name: Administrative Areas
tags.description: Operations related to named geopolitical areas

get.summary: Provides a way to search assets
get.description: This operation allows for discovery of assets. It returns a list of assets matching the search parameters and the centroid of the assets location.  Despite this documentation the return format is not geojson, just regular json

get.summary: Provides detail about a single asset, including ownership information
get.description: Provides detail about a single asset, including ownership information

get.summary: Provides a list of countries (ISO3 codes) and the number of assets within it
get.description: Not implemented

200.description: List of country codes and the number of assets in each

get.summary: Provides a list of remainders by sector

200.description: List of emission remainders for the parameters provided

get.summary: Emissions summarized by asset categories
get.description: Emissions from the assets defined by the group of filters provided. The emissions are grouped by country or continent, with country taking precendence

200.description: List of emission remainders for the parameters provided

get.summary: Assets belonging to the ower provided
get.description: A list of assets IDs belonging to the owner id in the query

get.summary: Assets inside the administrative area provided
get.description: A list of Asset Ids that are within the administrative area provided in the query

get.summary: Provides emissions time-series emissions data, broken down by sector
get.description: This operation replaces /emissions_by_sector_time-series in the v1 API

200.description: A time-series of emissions grouped by sector

get.summary: Provides emissions time-series emissions data, broken down by subsector
get.description: This operation replaces /emissions_by_sector_time-series in the v1 API

200.description: A time-series of emissions grouped by sector

get.summary: Provides emissions time-series emissions data, broken down by continent
get.description: This operation replaces /emissions_by_sector_time-series in the v1 API

200.description: A time-series of emissions grouped by sector

get.summary: Provides emissions time-series emissions data, broken down by country
get.description: This operation replaces /emissions_by_sector_time-series in the v1 API

200.description: A time-series of emissions grouped by sector

get.summary: Provides a list of available data time spans
get.description: This operation returns a list of years for which data is available, for the given country and sector or subsector. Subsector takes presedence if both are provided

200.description: A list of years for which data is available

get.description: This returns emissions aggregated by country for a given list of sectors or subsectors. Either the sectors or subsectors parameter is required - sectors take precedence

200.description: A time-series of emissions grouped by country

get.description: This returns emissions aggregated by country for a given list of sectors or subsectors. Either the sectors or subsectors parameter is required - sectors take precedence

200.description: A time-series of emissions grouped by country

get.summary: Get Raster Tiles
get.description: Returns a list of sectors for which tile layers are available

get.summary: Get Raster tile years
get.description: Returns a list of years for which tile layers are available for the provided sector

get.summary: Get Tile Json
get.description: Returns a tilejson document describing the tileset available for the given year and sector

get.summary: Get Sector tiles
get.description: Returns a list of sectors for which vector tiles are available

get.summary: Get vector tile years
get.description: Returns a list of years for which vector tiles are available for the given sector

get.summary: Search for administrative areas
get.description: Returns a list of matching administrative ares for the given parameters

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A name (or fragment) of the administrative area

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: The GADM level: 0 indicates country, 1 indicates province, 2 indicates city or county

200.description: Generically encoded list of administrative areas

get.summary: Get admininstrative area by id
get.description: Returns an administrative area by its id

get.summary: Get admininstrative area in geojson format
get.description: Returns an administrative area in geojson

200.description: The administrative area encoded as a geojson feature

get.summary: Provides a list of known sectors

200.description: List of sector names and ids

get.summary: Provides a list of known groups

200.description: List of countries belonging to given group

get.summary: Provides a detail for a particular groups

200.description: List of countries belonging to given group

get.summary: Provides a list of known countries

200.description: List of country codes and names

get.summary: Provides detail for a specific country
get.description: This operation is new in the v3 API

get.summary: Provides a list of known continents

200.description: List of continents and the countries in each

get.summary: Provides continents detail
get.description: This operation is new in the v3 API

get.summary: Provides a list of known gases
Provides detail for a specific sub-sector
get.description: This operation replaces /subsectors in the v1 API

get.summary: Provides a list of SubSectors
get.description: This operation replaces /subsectors in the v1 API

offset.name: offset
offset.description: For pagination, an offset from the start of the sequence of items

limit.name: limit
limit.description: The maximum number of items to return

country_path.name: country
country_path.description: The 3 letter code specifying the country

country.name: country
country.description: The 3 letter code specifying the country

country_optional.name: country
country_optional.description: The 3 letter code specifying the country

countries_csv.name: countries
countries_csv.description: A comma separated list of 3 letter code specifying the countries. A list of supported countries is available from the /v0/definitions/countries endpoint

countries_csv_optional.name: countries
countries_csv_optional.description: A comma separated list of 3 letter code specifying the countries. A list of supported countries is available from the /v0/definitions/countries endpoint

continents_csv.name: continents
continents_csv.description: A comma separated list of continents

groups_csv_optional.name: groups
groups_csv_optional.description: A comma separated list of groups, available at /v4/definitions/groups

continents_csv_optional.name: continents
continents_csv_optional.description: A comma separated list of continents

admin_id_optional.name: adminId
admin_id_optional.description: the id of an administrative area

admin_id.name: id
admin_id.description: the id of an administrative area

since.name: since
since.description: The start year (inclusive). Must be less than 'to' parameter

to.name: to
to.description: The end year (inclusive). Must be larger than 'since' parameter

years_csv.name: years
years_csv.description: A comma separated list of years to include

sectors_csv.name: sectors
sectors_csv.description: A comma separated list of Sectors

sectors_csv_optional.name: sectors
sectors_csv_optional.description: A comma separated list of Sectors

subsectors_csv_optional.name: subsectors
subsectors_csv_optional.description: A comma separated list of SubSectors

bbox_optional.description: a bounding box according to RFC7946 - https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7946#section-5
bbox_optional.name: bbox

point_optional.description: a WGS84 Point in the form of longitude, latitude according to RFC1946
point_optional.name: point

type.description: A URI reference [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type.

status.description: The HTTP status code ([RFC7231], Section 6) generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

debugging.description: Debugging information for DEV and QA environments.
